headline: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) Valuation Check After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (CL): recent performance and business profile Colgate-Palmolive (CL) has drawn fresh attention after a strong recent run in its share price, prompting investors to reassess how the company’s current valuation lines up with its fundamentals and growth profile. The stock’s returns over the past week, month and past 3 months sit alongside positive 1 year, 3 year and 5 year total return figures. That track record, combined with the company’s global consumer footprint, has...

headline: A Legacy of Brighter Smiles: Celebrating 24 Years of the Give Kids A Smile Program
summary: HOUSTON, February 06, 2026--The American Dental Association Foundation (ADAF) is officially kicking off Give Kids A Smile® (GKAS) 2026 at UTHealth Houston School of Dentistry, marking 24 years of transforming children’s lives through this access-to-oral-health-care initiative. What began as a local grassroots movement in St. Louis, MO, has evolved into a national movement, having served more than 10.2 million underserved children since 2003. GKAS begins nationally in February, which is National

content.title: A Legacy of Brighter Smiles: Celebrating 24 Years of the Give Kids A Smile Program
content.summary: HOUSTON, February 06, 2026--The American Dental Association Foundation (ADAF) is officially kicking off Give Kids A Smile® (GKAS) 2026 at UTHealth Houston School of Dentistry, marking 24 years of transforming children’s lives through this access-to-oral-health-care initiative. What began as a local grassroots movement in St. Louis, MO, has evolved into a national movement, having served more than 10.2 million underserved children since 2003. thumbnail.caption: A participant receiving a dental exam during the 2025 national kick-off event at Meharry Medical College School of Dentistry.
